pullrequest.title: Logging Part 6: Playback ignition transport topics

content.raw:
The catch with that approach is that the regex pattern would get saved, and every new topic that gets advertised would be checked against that pattern. However, the pattern would only apply to this single topic, which we have already subscribed to, so performing that check would be wasteful.

That said, we can look into making this code DRY-er, maybe by refactoring the `AddTopic(~)` functions to use a common implementation function of some kind.
